predicate.note: Frames file for 'present' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class fulfilling-13.4.1, other framed members include charge and invest. Comparison to 'give'.

roleset.name: give

example.name: just transitive
example.text: But such a combination also presents great risks.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: But I think we are losing credibility because when the market does this, it doesn't present itself as a rational investment.

example.name: with recipient
example.text: John presented Mary with a bouquet of wilted dandelions.

roleset.note: I'm betting the 'attributive' only occurs when arg1 is a reflexive.
